entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 9:09 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:09 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023
